original_title: Robert Klein: The Amorous Busboy of Decatur Avenue
overview: In his eighth HBO special, the comic reflects on humorous events from his childhood, his summer job as a lifeguard in the Catskills, the 1960s sexual revolution and signs of aging. Taped in New York City at the John Jay College Theater.
title: Robert Klein: The Amorous Busboy of Decatur Avenue
